posts.post_title: T210 Series 6 Lot of 7 For Sale with Graded
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone I have a lot of seven Winchester players for sale. Two are sgc 60 which are very tough in high grade. Asking 450 for the entire group. I accept PayPal for payment and  I will cover priority mail shipping. I will also consider partial trade for a t210 Fred toney as well. If interested message me at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url]

Thanks

William
Ill take them, sending PM for payment
Group was sold sorry for delay.
Do you have any extra Winchester cards available?
